div.l: But specially I pray the oost dere
Gete vs mete ⁊and drynke ⁊and make vs good chere
And we schal pay trewly att þe fulle
Wᵗith empty hand men may noo hawkes calle
Loo here oure siluer redy for to spende
Þis Miller to þe Toun his doughtere sende
For ale ⁊and for breed and rosted hem a goos
And bonde here hors he schuld no more goo loos
And in his own Chambre he made hem a bed
Wᵗith schetes and Chalons faire and spred
Not ferre fro here own bed xᵉ foot or xiiᵉ
His doughter had a bed all bi here selfe
Right in þe same Chambr͗e by and by
It myght be no bett and cause why
Þer was no rōmmer herborow in þe place
They sowpen and speken of solas
And euer drunken̄ strong ale att þe best
About mydnyght went þei to rest
Wele hath þis Miller vernysshed his heed
Full pale he was for drunken · and not reed
He yeskith and speketh þrugh the nose
As he were on þe quacke or on þe pose
To bedde he goth and wᵗith hym his wyfe
As any Iay he light was and Iolife
So was here ioly whistell well y wette
The Cradill att here beddis feet was sette
To rocke and to yeue the Childe sowke
And when̄ þat drunkyn was all in þe Crowke
To bedde went þe doughter right anon̄
To bedde goth Aleyn and also Iohn
Þer was no more / hem nedith no wale
This Miller hath so wisely bibbed ale
That as an hors he snorteth in his slepe
Ne of his taile be hynde he took no kepe
His wife bare hym a burdon̄ þat was ful strong
Men myght here rowtyng here a furlong
The wenche rowted eke ꝑpar Companye
Aleyn þe Clerke þat herde this melodye
He poked Iohn / and saide slepist thowe
Herde thowe euer soche a song or nowe
Loo whiche a Couplyng is among hem all
A wilde fire on þer bodies fall
This long nyght tydith me no rest
But yit no force al schal be for þe best
For Iohn seyde he as euer mote y thryfe
If that y may yondir wenche woll y swyfe
Some esement has lawe schapen̄ vs
For Iohn þer is a lawe þat seyeth þus
Þat if a man̄ in oo poynt be agreued
Þat in a noder he schall be releued
Oure corn̄ is stole sothly it is no nay
And we haue had an evill fitt þis day
And synne y schall haue noon amendement
Agayn my lostes y wol haue an easement
